content.question: A primary goal of Philip II of Spain was to

choices.label: create a monarchy accessible to the people
reunite the Spanish and Austrian Hapsburg empires
maintain Spanish control of the Netherlands

content.answer: maintain Spanish control of the Netherlands

topic.text: 3.8: Comparison in the Age of Absolutism and Constitutionalism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
